Question
========
  
Uncertainty regarding a prediction about a population mean disappears when: 
Answerlist
----------
* The population standard deviation is known.
* The sample contains all subjects of a population.
* The t-distribution approximates a normal distribution.
* Both a, b and c are correct.


Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
